ygData.msgSnippet: ... Smiling at him. The Cybertron fire?  Yes they have. But they came to late to help us. The preds had left by then. She liked having his arm around her.

::Spears::

Smiling at him. "The Cybertron fire?  Yes they have. But they came to 
late to help us. The preds had left by then." She liked having his 
arm around her.  She felt safe with him.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker smiles at Spears, returning the hug. "Good."
> 
> He looks at the Ark, his arms still around Spears. "Has the base 
been 
> notified of this?"
